name: Fellow Travelers
description:
A Chaos Magick / Meditation / Contemplation thingy I made to teach myself the basics of Godot. Enter in your wish, desire, question, destination etc. and the program will combine it with time and convert it in to a digital sigil for you. the sigil is then used to create a procedurally generated response made of location, objects and motion for you to use however you like! 

Gazzzzze at its wonders to enter a deep state.

Read it like an oracle to learn all the things! 

Make out with it!

Consume it as a tasty snack!

<3 <3 <3
